column4: I ge t a [Errno 5] Input/Output error, when installing from CD. The CD is new, the drive is old but has been working untill now, so dont know about the hard drive, how can I check if this eeror was caused vy the CD or the HardDrive? How can I check the hard drive?
the CD has a self test-feature, and for the hd there's usually some DOS vendor utility to perfom sanity checks
no i mean a vendor supplied utility for checkeing and low-level formatting the hd... look at western digital, samsung, seagate or hitachis website for it
